type.name: org.gradle.nativeplatform.toolchain.GccCompatibleToolChain
type.description: A ToolChain that can handle additional platforms simply by configuring the NativeBinary.

method.name: eachPlatform
method.description: Adds an action that can fine-tune the tool configuration for each platform supported by this tool chain.

method.name: getPath
method.description: The paths setting required for executing the tool chain. These are used to locate tools for this tool chain, and are prepended to the system PATH when executing these tools.

method.name: path
method.description:
Append an entry or entries to the tool chain path.
param:pathEntries The path values to append. These are evaluated as per org.gradle.api.Project#files(Object...)

method.name: target
method.description: Add support for target platform specified by name.

method.name: target
method.description: Add configuration for a target platform specified by name with additional configuration action.

property.name: path
property.description: The paths setting required for executing the tool chain. These are used to locate tools for this tool chain, and are prepended to the system PATH when executing these tools.
